arStrings.szText: You have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} chance to gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} {c_important}{u}Ferocity{/u}{/c} when you Crowd Control an enemy or apply any Stagger to a Boss.
You have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|%|]{/c} chance to gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} {c_important}{u}Ferocity{/u}{/c} when you Crowd Control an enemy or apply any Stagger to a Boss.
